'''"Iron, Water, Steam"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Iron, Water, Steam" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating an [[Eremite]] camp in [[Wounded Shin Valley]].
